BlackBox.name: Clash.Explicit.ROM.rom#
BlackBox.type:
rom# :: ( KnownDomain dom        ARG[0]
         , KnownNat n    --       ARG[1]
         , Undefined a ) --       ARG[2]
      => Clock dom       -- clk,  ARG[3]
      -> Enable dom      -- en,   ARG[4]
      -> Vec n a         -- init, ARG[5]
      -> Signal dom Int  -- rd,   ARG[6]
      -> Signal dom a
